errors.name: OfferNotFound
errors.message: The requested offer ID does not exist. It may have been cancelled, completed, or never created.

errors.name: TradeNotFound
errors.message: The requested trade ID does not exist.

errors.name: AlreadyHasActiveOffer
errors.message: The seller already has an active offer and cannot create another one.

errors.name: TradeExpired
errors.message: The trade has passed its expiration time and is no longer valid.

errors.name: InvalidTradeStatus
errors.message: The operation is not permitted for the trade's current status.

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.message: The caller is not authorized to perform this operation.

errors.name: TradeAlreadyInitiated
errors.message: This offer already has an active trade in progress.

errors.name: ContractPaused
errors.message: All trading operations are temporarily disabled.

errors.name: TradeNotExpired
errors.message: The trade has not yet expired and cannot be resolved.

errors.name: InsufficientAllowance
errors.message: The seller has not approved the contract to spend the required USDC amount, or their balance is too low.

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.message: The provided amount is invalid (e.g., zero, negative, or outside the allowed limits).

errors.name: TokenTransferFailed
errors.message: The USDC token transfer failed for a technical reason.

errors.name: InvalidTokenAddress
errors.message: The provided token address is not a valid token.

errors.name: RateLimitExceeded
errors.message: The user has exceeded the allowed rate limit for this operation.
